snippet: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Nets owner spoke with Herb Turetzky, the Nets scorekeeper and perhaps the man who best understands the franchise's past.
abstract: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Nets owner spoke with Herb Turetzky, the Nets scorekeeper and perhaps the man who best understands the franchise's past.

headline.main: In Brooklyn, an Eye on the Past and Excitement for the Future
